references.reason: This paper is foundational for the object detection component of AdaptiveISP, serving as the core of the object detection method.

references.paper_title: Hyperparameter optimization in black-box image processing using differentiable proxies
references.reason: This paper introduces a key method used to optimize the ISP parameters in AdaptiveISP

references.paper_title: ReconfigISP: Reconfigurable camera image processing pipeline
references.reason: This paper is directly comparable to AdaptiveISP, representing a state-of-the-art reconfigurable ISP pipeline.

references.paper_title: Refactoring ISP for high-level vision tasks
references.reason: This paper explores a similar problem of jointly optimizing ISPs and downstream tasks, providing a comparative baseline for AdaptiveISP.

references.paper_title: DynamicISP: dynamically controlled image signal processor for image recognition
references.reason: This paper presents another recent work on dynamic ISPs for image recognition, offering a direct comparison point for AdaptiveISP's adaptive capabilities.
